INSERT INTO notice_board_comment ( comment_no, notice_no, user_id, comment_content, comment_date, parent_comment_no, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{commentNo}, #{noticeNo}, #{userId}, #{commentContent}, SYSTIMESTAMP, #{parentCommentNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_no, c.notice_no, c.user_id, u.user_nickname, c.comment_content, c.comment_date, c.parent_comment_no, c.is_deleted FROM notice_board_comment c LEFT JOIN opendata_users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.notice_no = #{noticeNo} AND c.is_deleted = 'N' ORDER BY c.comment_no DESC

SELECT comment_no, notice_no, user_id, user_nickname, comment_content, comment_date, parent_comment_no, is_deleted FROM ( SELECT c.comment_no, c.notice_no, c.user_id, u.user_nickname, c.comment_content, c.comment_date, c.parent_comment_no, c.is_deleted, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY c.comment_no DESC) AS rn FROM notice_board_comment c LEFT JOIN opendata_users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.notice_no = #{noticeNo} AND c.is_deleted = 'N' AND c.parent_comment_no IS NULL ) WHERE rn > #{offset} AND rn <= #{offset} + #{limit} ORDER BY comment_no DESC

SELECT comment_no, notice_no, user_id, user_nickname, comment_content, comment_date, parent_comment_no, is_deleted FROM ( SELECT c.comment_no, c.notice_no, c.user_id, u.user_nickname, c.comment_content, c.comment_date, c.parent_comment_no, c.is_deleted, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY c.comment_no DESC) AS rn FROM notice_board_comment c LEFT JOIN opendata_users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.notice_no = #{noticeNo} AND c.is_deleted = 'N' ) WHERE rn > #{offset} AND rn <= #{offset} + #{limit} ORDER BY comment_no DESC
